\begin{frame}{Summary}
  Based on our sentiment (direction) + HAR volatility model:
  \begin{itemize}
    \item Spot: \textbf{\$ \spotUSD} \hfill (as of \reportDate)
    \item P(up) tomorrow: \textbf{\probUpOneDay\%}
    \item 1D median: \textbf{\$ \pOneMed} \ (10--90\%: \use{pOneP10}--\use{pOneP90})
    \item 7D median: \textbf{\$ \pSevenMed} \ (10--90\%: \use{pSevenP10}--\use{pSevenP90})
    \item 30D median: \textbf{\$ \pThirtyMed} \ (10--90\%: \use{pThirtyP10}--\use{pThirtyP90})
  \end{itemize}
\end{frame}
